{{cpp/filesystem/directory_entry/title|replace_filename}}
{{cpp/filesystem/directory_entry/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|since=c++17|1=
void replace_filename( const std::filesystem::path&amp; p );
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++17|1=
void replace_filename( const std::filesystem::path&amp; p, std::error_code&amp; ec );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Changes the filename of the directory entry.

Effectively modifies the path member by {{c|path.replace_filename(p)}} and calls {{ltt|cpp/filesystem/directory_entry/refresh|refresh}} to update the cached attributes. If an error occurs, the values of the cached attributes are unspecified.

This function does not commit any changes to the filesystem.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|p|the path to append to the parent path of the currently stored path}}
{{par|ec|out-parameter for error reporting in the non-throwing overload}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)

===Exceptions===
{{cpp/filesystem/error_handling|p|throw=1/2}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;filesystem&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;

int main()
{
    namespace fs = std::filesystem;
    {
        fs::directory_entry entry{"alpha"};
        std::cout &lt;&lt; entry &lt;&lt; '\n';
        entry.replace_filename("omega");
        std::cout &lt;&lt; entry &lt;&lt; '\n';
    }
    {
        fs::directory_entry entry{"/alpha/"};
        std::cout &lt;&lt; entry &lt;&lt; '\n';
        entry.replace_filename("omega");
        std::cout &lt;&lt; entry &lt;&lt; '\n';
    }
}
|output=
"alpha"
"omega"
"/alpha/"
"/alpha/omega"
}}
